lines.text: I can't believe we paid $50 a ticket for this.
I thought clowns were supposed to be funny!
Is this supposed to be funny?
You suck!
Give us a refund!
Ugh, this is so disappointing.
She's the one who forgot to learn her lines!
She's the one who wouldn't stop playing Minecraft so we could rehearse!
I am a professional, dammit!
Lies! Lies! Nothing but lies!
History will vindicate me!
I don't even know what Minecraft is!
You completely screwed us!
This is all her fault! Yell at her!
Don't judge us!
You're both equally terrible!
They hate us!
We're ruined!
Oh me oh my...
Look what you've all done!
Morro, it's going to be okay.
Oh my oh me...
We're going to have to live under a bridge and steal bread from children!
We're going to have to turn into mimes!
We are going to have to learn to make balloon animals!
Good! You deserve it!
I'm out of here!
Just... we're going to figure this out. Please don't go anywhere.
You want a show? We'll give you a show! Right after we figure out what it is!
Everyone, just shut up! Just give us a few minutes to think!
Please enjoy the intermission!
We're out, jerks! Don't choke on your snack in the lobby!
What about performance art? Everyone likes performance art!
Well, we made it to the end. I'm a genius!
Morro, we did it! We reached the ending.
It's here at last. The sweet, sweet end.
What about me?
It's true, Jaspy. You're the genius-est!
Can we go home now?
This game has an ending?
I can't believe it! We're finally here!
Zippa-dee-do-da!
The sweet, sweet, sweet, SWEET end!
Sweet relief.
Yaaaaaaawn.
Morro, if it weren't for me, none of this would have happened.
Don't argue with me. We know how that goes.
Sure you are.
Yup! I'm a genius!
Great work, Morro!
Great work, players! We salute you!
Come on, don't get lazy now.
Soooo... let's just end it then?
Yes, we made it. I'm a genius!
Why can't I be a genius too?!
You always get the best acclamations.
Then I am a super genius.
Hey players, give yourselves a round of applause!
Great work Jasp!
I LOVE YOU ALL!
ENDING... NOW!
Yes.
Maybe not.
What are you talking about? The play just started!
Quiet! You're not even a real audience.
Those poor suckers, they don't realize they're never actually leaving this theatre.
Short and sweet, just the way we like it!
I'm going to sleep after this.
Isn't there like a million more endings though?
Let's go for iced cream!
By the way, I bet you've only seen like one... fiftieth... hundredth of stuff in this game.
You can't! What if they want to keep playing?
Wait, if they actually got this far... do you think they want more?
I've been thinking... what if we added some in-app purchases?
It's true, we really overdelivered in terms of content with this.
How many endings ARE there? The menu screen says like 50, but...
And just imagine if we added some downloadable content!
Ooh, what if you could download special COSTUMES for us?!
Morro and Jasp Unscripted, Volume 2: The Jaspening.
I do like spending time in this recording studio. The wood smells nice.
You'll never find all the endings! Never! Just go ahead and try!
Ooh yeah, we could still be here a while.
If you haven't gotten to the part with the pegacorn yet, you definitely gotta keep playing.
Still, this is a pretty big milestone!
Anyway, let's celebrate!
I know the perfect thing to do!
So... what now?
Let's go out with a bang! Morro?
Uh, well... I'm not sure.
BALLOONS!
BUNNIES!
BIG BUSHELS OF BULBOUS BERRIES!
Do we just keep... talking?
I never really thought this moment would arrive.
Maybe just turn off the game?
Honestly, I never really thought anyone would reach this part.
Wait! Will we continue to exist after the game is off?
What if the people playing right now are the last people to ever play this game in all of history?
I guess we should do this right. Morro?
Hmm, let's end this properly. Morro?
Hooray!
Welcome ladies and gentle sirs.
Shout out to all of the peoples.
Yo yo homies!
You can't call them your homies, Morro.
Check it.
We are going to treat you to the incredible Rap stylings of Jasperilla and Morronic!
My name is Morro the Destroyer of Sorro!
It's MC Ori Ori Orro!
I'm Super Morro!
That is the worst rap name ever.
Is this offensive?
Are clowns allowed to rap?
I am the Queen of Rhymes!
No it's not.
I don't care what you think.
Haters gonna hate.
Whatever Morro.
<Rolls her eyes>
Urgh.
Maybe.
Hmm... We should give props to the people who invented rap.
What about our forefathers? Or foresisters?
Yeah we should.
Who do you mean?
Right.
We love the people that started rap and then inspired hip hop.
All the people that have ever been involved in rap are our heroes.
The magic makers!
We are inspired by you.
Have you been reading books?
Can we get back to the scene now, please?
We even know that rap had its roots in West Africa.
To the "griots" of West Africa: You have inspired so many musicians and genres.
Yes.
We know this because we just googled it.
How do you know all this?!
I did not know that...
Audience, give us a beat.
Just imagine there is a beat.
This is going to be the best rap that ever was.
We are going to blow your mind.
Rap sisters better than the misters.
We're here to sing it loud 'cause-
As we speak in time.
Don't just say it in whispers.
We got a lot to say.
We hope you realize.
Shout it from the roof tops.
We'll try not to spit on you today.
This is a special moment in our lives.
'Cause we don't want no one who flip flops.
So hold your head up high.
Take today and make it yours.
Say it loud and say it proud.
And say goodbye.
Throw open all the doors.
Not fluffy like a cloud.
'Cuz that's what we're about.
You are the one and only.
Pump it up.
Don't shout.
I'll never be lonely.
Yippity yup.
Don't call the police.
A kiss for now.
Let's holla like there's no tomorra.
Just say peace.
Let's take a bow.
Let's hear it now for Jasp and Morr... a.
Thank you.
Drop the mic.
We out.
Word to your mother!
<Drops the mic>
Peace.

Thank you! Thank you very much!!!
The fearful passage of their death-mark'd love.

(shouting) The fearful passage of their death-mark'd love!!!!!!!
And the continuance of their parents' rage.

And the continuance of their parents' RAAAAAAGE!
Which, but their children's end, nought could remove...

(shouting) Which, but their children's end, nought could remove!!!
Is NOW the two hours' traffic of our stage!

Is now the 2 hours' traffic of our STAGE!

Thank ye! Thank ye! We shall see you anon!

You are impossible!
AHHHHHHHH!
Stella!!!!
Can’t touch this. Da na na na na-na na-na.
Frankly, Jaspy, I don’t give a damn!

<Giggles>

You're sooooooo good at this Jasp!
Morro... have I ever told you... you're the best?

<Hiccups>

Yeaaaaaaah drop it it's like it's hoooooooooo.
<Hiccups>

I... have the... kind of sleepy...

lines.text: I will not give in to the pain.
Ouchy!
Save me. I am dying. The poison is too much.
Morro, what will I do without you?
If you die, I die with you.
No, Jasp! It's too dangerous.
Jasp, you won't like death.
It's time to let me go, Jasp.
But who will I give orders to?
Don't tell me what to do. That's my job.
You're right. Goodbye Morro.
...But Jasp...
Oh the pain...
<Coughs sharply>
That's it! I'm dying too.
Wait for me to catch up.
Hurry Jasp. I'm dying fast.
This is just like Romeo and Juliet... except we're sisters...
Here on this mound, two sisters left the world together.
Ahhh the pain.
Let it be so.
<Gurgles>
Ahhhhggg... I feel my last breath.
<Wimpers>
Rosebud.
Goodbye sweet world.
How can this be?!
<Silence>
(whispers) I'm dead now.
<Silence>
(whispers) Me too.
<Silence>

lines.text: So long to all the ones I love.
Goodbye flowers.
Goodbye Jasp.
Oh Morro, it has been swell.
So young.

I have one last request.
Oh the pain.
How long do you think this might take?

Yes.
Oh so much pain.
Tell me I am the lizard queen.

Morro!
Say it: "Morro is the LIZARD QUEEN!"

I'm going now...
<Gurgles>

(whispers) Thank you.
<Gurgles>
Morro, quiet.
Shhhhhhhh.
A great, great warrior.

lines.text: <Blinks>
<Punches>
<Blinks>
<Punches>
What did you just say?
Peoria? PEORIA?
Ya. Peoria. Will we play there?
Have you never heard that before? Everyone plays there apparently.
Don't say that word again or I'll -- I'll --
If I ever go back to Peoria it'll be the last time
Jeeze-louise! It's just some small town. What's the problem?
Holy moly! What did Peoria ever do to you?
They're all clown haters in that -- that place!
Why I oughtta...
Why don't you tell me about it?
Go on. Let it out.
I performed my one-clown show there last year...
I performed my 8-act opus there in the spring...
I remember. The reviews were terrible.
I remember. I was the only one in the audience.
As I walked out of the theatre, I heard someone calling my name.
As I walked out of the theatre, I could see an angry mob coming towards me.
I don't remember any of this.
Pee-Oh-Ria. What a funny name. It's like two gross things mushed together.
Before I knew it, I was being pelted with tomatoes.
Before I knew it, I was being chased out of town by clown-haters!
Oh no! That's so sad. What did you do?
Oh no! I really don't recall this. Where was this again?
I ran straight for the Peoria train station
I hopped in a cab and went to Peoria International Airport
I don't think that's a real place.
This is a long story...
When I arrived, someone came up behind me and tapped me on the shoulder.
Somewhere behind me a voice said "Oh Jaaasssssppppeeeyyyy"
Uh-oh.
How much more before the punchline?
Slowly I turned and there was the sweetest little girl I'd ever seen.
Slowly I turned and there was the handsomest boy I'd ever laid eyes upon
So it's a happy ending? Yay!
So that's why you're so angry?
And that's when I got hit in the face with a pie!
And that's when I got my nose honked by a stranger!
Pie? Did you just say pie?
Yes. Why?
No reason. Hey, what's your favourite kind of pie?
That's awful! How could they do that to you?
That's hilarious! Where was I?
So I've vowed to never return to that evil place.
And that's why I've instituted a Morro and Jasp travel ban to that wicked place.
Where? Peoria?
Peoria, Illinois? Or Peoria, Kazakhstan? I'm checking on wikipedia.
<attacks Morro>
PEORIA!!!
HOW'S THAT FOR CLASSIC COMEDY?! <she attacks the audience>
Staring contest. Called it. Starts now!
I challenge you to a staring contest.
Hooray!
Absolutely not.
You're on!
Okay, but you're not allowed to talk.
<Stares intently>
<Stares into the middle distance>
<Stares while crossing eyes>
<Flutters eyelids slightly>
You are going to lose.
<Stares intensely>
<Stares with a silent furor>
<Stares with the strength of a hundred clowns>
<Squints slightly>
Shhhhhhhh.
I am peering into your soul.
Look into my eyes...
<Stares intently>
I am staring right through you...
Ack, dry eye!
I am not doing this.
Morro, enough!
Stop it!
Okay, fine! I'll stare you down so hard you'll be blind for a week.
You know you can't beat me.
I'm in the zone.
See this eye? It's the eye of the tiger.
Oh no, I forgot I'm wearing contacts!
Jasp! Jasp! Jasp!
Just give up now, Morro.
(This is mine to lose!)
Morro! Morro! Morro!
Yer goin' down, punk!
(The crowd is with me!)
(Wow, eyes are really weird if you think about it.)
(I can't take this much longer!)
(I wonder if she can hear my thoughts.)
(I've gotta win this!)
(Ooh, I can see my reflection in there.)
(I wonder if I can hear her thoughts.)
(It's true, eyes ARE really weird.)
(I'm going to slip any second, I can feel it...)
(You are not gonna win!)
(Is this boring for the audience to watch?)
You are getting verrrrry sleeeeepy....
Oops! I almost blinked!
Oh my gosh, look at that thing behind you!
If you give up, I'll do laundry for a week.
Don't look now, but there's something crawling down your forehead...
Did you know it's possible for your eyes to literally fall out if you go too long without blinking?
Ow, this is starting to hurt!
If you give up, I'll buy you a cake.
Oh, what's that, a little nervous twitch in your eyebrow?
You don't have the willpower for this.
Go Jasp go!
<Stares with grim, unyielding resolve>
(deep breath) Time to end this!
Go Morro go!
<Stares with the white hot intensity of a thousand suns>
Home stretch! Here we go!
<Blinks>
<Squints dramatically>
<Uses hands to keep eyelids separated>
(My eyes are gonna fall out!)
(Eyes... burning...)
<Blinks>
<Lets a trickle of sweat roll down her forehead>
<Scrunches up eyebrows real tight>
(Blink Morro! Just blink already!)
(I can't handle it anymore!)
<Blinks>
Can't... stop... won't... stop...
Can't... let... my fans... down...
Just a little longer! Keep it together, Morro!
I can see through time!
<Blinks>
Just give up! We're going to go blind!
Never give up! Never surrender!
These eyes are only gonna close when they're cold and dead!
I can't... feel... my face...
You blinked! I'm the winner!
A-ha! I saw that!
Oh my gosh, did I just win? Can I close my eyes now?
Wooooooooooo Jasp!

lines.text: NO! We can't end it like that.
You know what? I don't like that ending at all.

We now carry on with our play tonight before you, oh Kings and Queens.
Presenting Hamlet!
Presenting Romeo and Juliet!

Something is rotten in the state of Denmark.

Two households both alike in digni- Wait! We did this part already! Next scene!

Okay...
Whatever.
I've always wanted to do this play!

Who are you?

Do you know me my lord-ess?
Polonius.

Not I my lord-ess.

Honest, my lord.
Honest, my lord-ess?
Me?

Ay, to be honest, is to be a woman pickt out of ten thousand.
You are pretty special then.
That's very true, my lord.
That's very true, my lord-ess.
Yup.
For if the sun breed maggots in a dead dog, - Have you a daughter?
Something else happens here, but I can't remember.
Yes. Do you have a daughter?
I have, my lord.
Just make something up...
What?
Let her not walk i' th' sun - friend, look to 't.
Don't let her get preggers.
Just curious.
I like to look at maggots in dead dogs.
What do you read, my lord?
You are mad.
Okaaay...
Words, words, words.
<Blinks>
<Makes a trumpet sound>
What is the matter, my lord?
What is the matter, my lord-ess?
What's wrong?
Between who?
What do you mean?
Huh?
I mean, the matter that you read, my lord.
I mean, the matter that you read , my lord-ess.
You look like something is wrong.
Slanders, sir: that old men have beards.

I feel old even though I'm not.
Though this be madness, yet there is method in't. Will you walk?
Let's go for a walk.
I can recommend a great facial lotion.
Into my grave?
Ohhhhh!
I'm going to die.
Indeed, that is out o'th'air.
Yup.
Where the heck did that come from?
You cannot take from me anything - except my life, except my life, except my life.
Take my life.
Just put me out of my misery.
Fare you well, my lord.
I'm gonna go now...
Fare you well, my lord-ess.

lines.text: Well well well...

Okay, so if you scare me this time, I'm just gonna keep going.
Ahem... I'm the Sheriff in that town down in that valley.

You've got a lot of nerve riding on into that town, missy.
Well that town is a nice one, I was hoping to settle down for a while and make a few buckeroos.
I've heard all sortsa things about that little town.
Well, how would you like some company until I learn the lay of the land?
I had a feeling you'd be here, but I hoped you would have gotten lost in Yonkers on the way.
You ever slept with one eye open?
You ever heard of vigilante justice?
You ever eaten bullets for breakfast?
Oh, I'm tougher than I look, Sheriff.
No! That sounds terrible!

Are you trying to mess with me, clown?
You're barking up the wrong apple tree.

Well the position of Sheriff's assistant is currently up for grabs, partner.

I could help you! I'm such a good helper!
